howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get mental health care in simple steps

steps.title: Find Your Counselor
steps.description: Browse through our verified counselors and find the one that best matches your needs. Filter by specialization, language, and availability.

steps.title: Book a Session
steps.description: Choose a convenient time slot from your counselor's schedule and book your session. You can opt for video calls or chat-based counseling.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Have a brief consultation with your counselor to discuss your needs and ensure they're the right fit for you.

steps.title: Regular Sessions
steps.description: Engage in regular counseling sessions through our secure platform. Your counselor will help you work through your challenges.

steps.title: Track Progress
steps.description: Monitor your progress through session notes and personal growth markers. Your counselor will help you set and achieve goals.

steps.title: Provide Feedback
steps.description: Share your experience and help others find the right counselor by providing feedback and ratings after your sessions.
